meanings.definition: A parasite that lives on the external surface of a host organism.
meanings.sent1: The epizoa attached themselves to the skin of the dog.
meanings.sent2: The epizoa on the cow were causing irritation.
meanings.sent3: The epizoa decided to throw a party on the host's back.
meanings.sent4: The epizoa spread like tiny vampires on the host's body.
meanings.sent5: The epizoa clung to the host like stubborn stickers.
